intent_atoms.description: Advance Task A5 from the IO roadmap by wiring up the random-slice benchmarking harness now that Task A4’s error taxonomy is complete.

Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate the end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow introduced in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/48_macOS_SwiftUI_Automation_Streaming_Default_Selection/48_macOS_SwiftUI_Automation_Streaming_Default_Selection.md.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics on a platform that ships Combine, keeping throughput parity with the CLI harness.
Surface session persistence errors once diagnostics plumbing is available.
Reconcile CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities when reconciliation rules are defined.

Track outcome of the notarized build Apple Events automation assessment alongside todo.md entry “PDD:30m Evaluate whether automation via Apple Events is required for notarized builds and extend entitlements safely.”

functional_units.name: Random-Slice Benchmarking Harness
functional_units.description: Provides a benchmarking capability for random-slice operations using a harness that measures performance metrics.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI Automation Flow for Streaming Selection
functional_units.description: Enables end-to-end SwiftUI automation testing of streaming selection features on macOS via XCTest.

functional_units.name: Combine-Backed UI Benchmark
functional_units.description: Captures latency and throughput metrics for Combine-based UI components on macOS, ensuring parity with CLI harness.

functional_units.name: Session Persistence Error Surface
functional_units.description: Exposes session persistence errors to users or developers once diagnostics plumbing is available.

functional_units.name: CoreData Session Bookmark Reconciliation
functional_units.description: Reconciles differences between CoreData session bookmarks and live bookmark entities according to defined rules.

functional_units.name: Apple Events Automation for Notarized Builds
functional_units.description: Automates notarized build processes using Apple Events, managing entitlements safely.
